programme.title: Doves, Hawks, Owls and the People
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke considers the power held by Alan Greenspan over the economic market plunge.
programme.medium_synopsis: Alistair Cooke considers the squawked warnings from two sides of the economic market plunge and the power held by Mr Alan Greenspan, the Chairman of the Federal Reserve Board.
